__data__.text: This is Crowd Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 6；Move to CHIJMES plazas at 7:00；Wait orderly according to guidance at 8:00；Observe crowd density and adjust position at 9:30；Continue moving and waiting as per event flow at 11:00；Take a short break in a suitable spot at 12:00；Follow on-site guidance for movement at 13:00；Adjust stopping position based on congestion at 14:30；Remain in place and observe crowd flow at 16:00；Finish activities and leave the plaza at 18:00
